FuncDef: This command allows one IGP to import its routes into RPF RTM while another IGP imports routes only into the unicast RTM. Import policies can redistribute routes from an IGP protocol into the RPF RTM (the multicast routing table). By default, the IGP routes will not be imported into RPF RTM; as such, an import policy must be explicitly configured.

ParaDef.Info: allows importation of both IPv4 and IPv6 routes.
allows importation of IPv4 routes only.
allows importation of IPv6 routes only.
